| InterPro = IPR007862 SMART = PROSITE = PDOC00104 MEROPS = SCOP = 1ake TCDB =
| OPM family = OPM protein = CAZy = CDD =
}} 'Adenylate kinase' () (also known as 'ADK' or 'myokinase') is a
phosphotransferase enzyme that catalyzes the interconversion of adenine
nucleotides, and plays an important role in cellular energy homeostasis.
